content: Alex is working hard to be on the grid and is full of ideas. His enthusiasm for motorsport is just what is needed for success.
author: Max Coates - Mini Challenge driver.

content: Alex is not just a solid and smooth driver behind the wheel but is also a terrific ambassador for the sport both on and off the track, and his passion and dedication can be of benefit to any team or championship he is part of.
author: Jake Sanson - Commentator/Presenter at Downforce UK

content: I have had the pleasure to work with Alex on a few occasions. Both at track and providing remote support. His understanding of engineering and vehicle dynamics gives him a major advantage over his other competitors. Also, how he presents himself on and off track, makes him an ideal for any sponsor.
author: Jordan Bird - Data Analyst Engineer.
